definition: electronic equipment that converts sound into electrical signals that can be transmitted over distances and then converts received signals back into sounds, get or try to get into communication with someone by telephone
details:
noun
- electronic equipment that converts sound into electrical signals that can be transmitted over distances and then converts received signals back into sounds
= example: electronic equipment that converts sound into electrical signals that can be transmitted over distances and then converts received signals back into sounds
= synonyms: telephone, telephone set
- (phonetics) an individual sound unit of speech without concern as to whether or not it is a phoneme of some language
= synonyms: sound
verb
- get or try to get into communication with someone by telephone
= example: get or try to get into communication with someone by telephone
= synonyms: call
